info.name: Kiorex Healthcare API - Updated
info.description: Complete API collection for Kiorex Healthcare Platform microservices with JWT authentication

request.description: Login with admin credentials and auto-save token
Get all appointments for current user
Get all payments for current user
Create a refund for a payment
Get medical records for a patient

body.raw:
{
  "patientId": "{{patientId}}",
  "providerId": "{{providerId}}",
  "recordType": "consultation",
  "chiefComplaint": "Regular checkup",
  "historyOfPresentIllness": "Patient reports feeling well",
  "physicalExamination": "Vital signs normal",
  "assessment": "Healthy patient",
  "plan": "Continue current medications"
}

{
  "email": true,
  "sms": false,
  "push": true,
  "inApp": true,
  "appointment_reminders": true,
  "prescription_updates": true,
  "lab_results": true,
  "emergency_alerts": true,
  "marketing": false
}

request.description: Get video sessions for current user

body.raw:
{
  "patientId": "{{patientId}}",
  "nurseId": "{{userId}}",
  "nurseName": "Jane Smith",
  "careType": "medication",
  "priority": "high",
  "scheduledTime": "2024-01-20T08:00:00Z",
  "description": "Administer morning medications",
  "instructions": "Give patient morning medications as prescribed"
}

{
  "patientId": "{{patientId}}",
  "nurseId": "{{userId}}",
  "nurseName": "Jane Smith",
  "noteType": "assessment",
  "priority": "medium",
  "content": "Patient appears stable. Vital signs within normal limits.",
  "summary": "Stable patient assessment"
}

{
  "title": "Patient Medical Record",
  "description": "Complete medical record for patient",
  "documentType": "medical_record",
  "category": "patient_records",
  "patientId": "{{patientId}}",
  "createdBy": "{{userId}}",
  "isConfidential": true,
  "accessLevel": "confidential"
}

{
  "name": "nurse",
  "description": "Nursing staff with patient care access",
  "permissions": [
    "patients.read",
    "medical_records.read",
    "appointments.read",
    "nurse_notes.create"
  ],
  "isActive": true
}
